1.Title: Cloud Flow
1.Description: CRIT Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>. When the equipper launches an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the character gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Qingming Companion</color> effect, stacking up to 2 times and lasting 15s. On entering combat, immediately gain 2 stacks. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of the <color=#FFFFFF>Qingming Companion</color> effect increases the equipper's <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>8%</color>, and increases Ultimate and EX Special Attack <color=#FE437E>Ether Sheer DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>.
